item.title: java-dynamic-heap-size
item.description: Java Dynamic Heap Size Below statistics are tested on: amazoncorretto:8-alpine-jre Percentage values can be used to set Maximum Heap Size: java -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:OnError='echo JVM exited with error' \ -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=90.0 \ -XX:MinRAMPercentage=40.0 \ -XX:+PrintGCDetails -jar app.jar When using percentage java heap size is set as below, Container Memory Heap Size 8G 6.40G 16G 12.80G 32G 25.60G 64G 26.67G 128G 26.67G So, JVM Heap Size doesn’t go beyond 26.67G when using XX:MaxRAMPercentage
